properties.homeappliances: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE category_name = 'Home Appliances'

properties.null: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NULL OR price IS NULL OR category_code IS NULL OR stock IS NULL
properties.notNull: SELECT * FROM FLOWFILE WHERE product_name IS NOT NULL AND price IS NOT NULL AND category_code IS NOT NULL AND stock IS NOT NULL
